tool_description: Extracts comprehensive financial statements and data from various sources for supplier financial analysis.

data_source.description: Source of financial data: SEC_FILINGS, COMPANY_DATABASE, THIRD_PARTY_PROVIDER

include_quarterly.description: Include quarterly data in addition to annual

error_messages: Invalid supplier ID: Supplier identifier not found in the system. Verify the supplier ID exists in your database.
Unsupported data source: Use one of [SEC_FILINGS, COMPANY_DATABASE, THIRD_PARTY_PROVIDER].
Invalid financial year: Year must be between 2000 and 2024.
Data not available: Financial data not available for specified supplier and year combination.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access the specified data source.
usage: Provide supplier_id, data_source, and financial_year. Optionally set include_quarterly to get quarterly data. Returns structured financial statement data including balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement.

balance_sheet_data.description: Balance sheet line items and values

income_statement_data.description: Income statement line items and values

cash_flow_data.description: Cash flow statement line items and values

data_completeness_score.description: Percentage of expected data fields that were successfully extracted
